body.name: Huggies Simply Clean Unscented Baby Wipes, 9 Flip-Top Packs (576 Wipes Total),64 Count (Pack of 9)
features: Pack of 9 HUGGIES Simply Clean Baby Wipes, soft packs, fragrance-free (576 sheets total)
HUGGIES Wipes is the #1 branded Wipe (based on market share in North America)
Perfect for hands, face and bottoms, providing a reliable and versatile clean
Alcohol-free and paraben-free-hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested
Disposable Soft Packs have a flip lid for easy wipe dispensing and are handy wherever you go
body.description: HUGGIES Simply Clean Baby Wipes deliver the perfect combination of convenience and versatility. They are perfect for baby bottoms, and a must-have item for the entire family. Use them to wipe hands, faces, and surfaces -- because kids outgrow diapers, not messes. Available in Fragrance-free and fresh scent varieties, HUGGIES Simply Clean Baby Wipes are hypoallergenic and free of alcohol, parabens, fragrance, phenoxyethanol and MIT. HUGGIES Simply Clean disposable Soft Packs have a flip lid for easy wipe dispensing. They're a great solution wherever you go. Choose the right wipe for your family, and the right style for you: big pack, portable soft pack, Refill Pack and pop-up tub wipes dispenser.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #22,566 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #183 in Diaper Wipes & Refills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t go Wrong!
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, this is exactly what I ordered. We don’t have any kids, I don’t purchase them for those reasons. My husband and I usually buy the boxes from Costco of the Kirkland brand close to monthly. We keep these wipes in our cars for hands cleaning, in our RV, in the bathrooms, craft rooms, and use them for quick clean up of dog messes, or spills, etc. They are quick and easy and can keep them everywhere! We use to purchase the Walmart generic brand wipes which were the cheapest, but I’ve learned they crumble almost, and you need to use more than one for a “small” job. The huggies are thicker, don’t crumble, and are softer (and no weird smells). Kirkland are still my favorite, more wipes, same price, good quality, but honestly sometimes I just really don’t want to drive to Costco just for wipes, since it’s packed, and a good 20-25 minute drive. So I’d rather order these from Amazon which I know are reliable, and just have them dropped off a day or two later. Can’t go wrong!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, large the very best wipe!
reviews.reviewText: We are not just changing baby diapers, though we find Huggies the best for babies! We change diapers for people with disabilities including incontinence. Many wipes are thin, too small to cover the hand of the changer, not soft. Simply unsuitable for the job. Huggies are worth the extra price over bargain brands that require twice as many wipes, negating any savings at all. We stick with this brand and this particular product. We love the subscription feature, with it, we never run out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have bought before
reviews.reviewText: I have bought these before and they are really great wipes. They are thick, don’t fall apart like some others, for me Huggies Wipes are the best and a great price too. These are not scented, which is a plus if there is a skin sensitivity issue. They were delivered very fast and in perfect condition, so overall I am very happy and will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zero residue, great cleaner, but a little harsh
reviews.reviewText: My fam & I go through a lot of these. Me especially because I’m disabled and use them for dry baths on the off days, or just cleaning hands. Having used practically every brand on my baby nieces butts, however, I would say that while these are great for “tough jobs” and clean extraordinarily well without leaving a residue, they can be a little rough and drying for using with every diaper change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite brand of wipes.
reviews.reviewText: Best bang for your buck. If you gotta buy wipes, might as well save a few dollars and buy this. Huggies are my favorite bc theyre thick, and not overly wet or dry. You only have to use a even on messy diaper changes. And the flip top packs are easy to get into, and stay sealed well. Also i like the smell of both the fresh scent, and the fragrence free, just nice and fresh and no sticky residue, so you can use them for everything (wiping hands and face too)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've tried EVERY brand of wipes
reviews.reviewText: I've had four kids in five years and I have tried EVERY wipe out there (pampers, Target brand, Walmart brand, Sam's, Costco, Amazon brand, etc.). These are my favorite. They are very sturdy! Nothing quite like wiping a baby's butt only to have the wipe rip and your finger plunge into poop ;) These are the only ones that I have found that do not rip. I am partial to pampers diapers, but prefer Huggies wipes. These have absolutely no scent so I would guess they would be perfect for sensitive skin. I use these for after dinner clean up as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not super soft.
reviews.reviewText: This one is not my favorite Huggies wipe. The blister packs are a great size to just grab and throw in the diaper bag and go. They smell great, which ro me means there is zero scent. And the the packages dont leak, which is a huge plus. They clean really well too. They just arent the softest wipe. They feel kind of papery. And they will burn a diaper rash. And sometimes I feel like your fingers my smell bad after using it I'd I dont double the wipes up. So all in all they are good wipes, just not my favorite, and not the softest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I have to say these wipes are impressive. I like that there is no strong smell. I also like that they don’t fall apart easily, they instead are strong! They have the perfect amount of wetness! They are not as soft as some of the other Huggies wipes, but I’ll take that over them falling apart. These some in nice packages so no refill container needed. Great buy and worth it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Best for handy wipes all around!
reviews.reviewText: Love these. These are thick and large very handy for cleaning up messy toddlers and anything else that you need done around the car or house. I love them because they are handy in my walker bag too. Great for sensitive skin, no reaction from this for my or my grandson eczema skin. Highly recommend. Thank you.
Muy resistentes, cambié por las supreme y la verdad son las unicas que nos han convencido
If you like the thickness of Kirkland brand wipes these are comparable. Bonus they can be used on faces and hands as well.
Very good wipes. You don’t need to go over your child’s bum/hands/face 100x to get them clean, as with other wipes.
